alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 7:40PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Minor flooding begins. Pasture and fields upstream, right and left bank from the Keiths Mill Road bridge, and downstream on the left bank begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
